get.description: List all available products (latest versions). Result is paged, with default page size 100.
Get prepared data about latest version of specified product.

404.description: There is no approved latest version of product with specified material number. Note that the product itself might exists.

519.description: There are several approved latest versions of the product. This should not happen unless someone manually modifies the data.

get.description: List basic data about sales organizations. Result is paged, with default page size 100.
Get prepared data about latest version of specified sales organization.

404.description: There is no approved latest version of sales organization. Note that the sales organization itself might exist.

519.description: There are several approved latest versions of the sales organization. This should not happen unless someone manually modifies the data.

get.description: List basic data about sales campaigns. Result is paged, with default page size 100.

result.name: Output SalesOrg - Campaign - 0800 - DE - Rev. 1
result.text: Health hilft Ihnen dabei, auf jedes unerwartete Ereignis, das Ihre Assets in der Anlage betrifft, vorbereitet zu sein. So können Sie effektive Maßnahmen zur Erhöhung der Anlagenverfügbarkeit ergreifen. Legen Sie jetzt los, es ist kostenlos!
result.title: IIoT Health

result.name: Output SalesOrg - Campaign - 0800 - EN - Rev. 1
result.text: Netilion Health empowers you to be ready and effective in case of unexpected events in your plant. Start now to see the ease of asset maintenance, it’s free.
result.title: Netilion Health

result.name: Output - SalesOrg - Campaign - 0000 - DE - Rev. 1
result.text: Füllstandmessung mit dem neuen Micropilot FMR60, 62 und 67
result.title: 113 GHz - Die Lösung für schwierigste Messaufgaben

get.description: Get prepared data about latest version of specified sales organization campaign.

value.name: Output SalesOrg - Campaign - 0800 - EN - Rev. 1
value.text: Netilion Health empowers you to be ready and effective in case of unexpected events in your plant. Start now to see the ease of asset maintenance, it’s free.
value.title: Netilion Health

404.description: There is no approved latest version of campaign for given sales organization and language. Note that sales organization campaign might exist, but it might not have been approved or it might not have any content in this particular langauge.

519.description: There are several approved latest versions of the campaign. This should not happen unless someone manually modifies the data.

language.name: language
language.description: Two-letter language code (for example en or de).

salesorgbasic_page.title: Sales Organization basic info list (one page)
